messages.msgSnippet: ... by proponents of the various sides. I guess there are local chapters so maybe they don t send out information everywhere. Joyce I was just at the library
messages.messageBody:
>League of Women Voters. They always send out something that's written
by proponents of the various sides. I guess there are local chapters
so maybe they don't send out information everywhere.>

Joyce

I was just at the library today and discovered a paper put out by
League of Women Voters. I have never received anything in the mail
before, but I am glad to know of the resource.

Thanks so much for your idea...

Tina

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] OT Question
messages.msgSnippet: ... League of Women Voters. They always send out something that s written by proponents of the various sides. I guess there are local chapters so maybe they
messages.messageBody:
On Oct 17, 2006, at 4:04 PM, Tina wrote:

> How do you educate yourself on the issues and the
> politicians in order to make your voting decisions?

League of Women Voters. They always send out something that's written
by proponents of the various sides. I guess there are local chapters
so maybe they don't send out information everywhere.

http://www.lwv.org/AM/Template.cfm?Section=Voter_Information

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: OT Question
messages.msgSnippet: With the upcoming elections I would really like to be informed.  Would any of you be willing to share with me where you get your information?  How do you
messages.messageBody:
With the upcoming elections I would really like to be informed. Would
any of you be willing to share with me where you get your
information? How do you educate yourself on the issues and the
politicians in order to make your voting decisions?

Politics aside, I would just like to learn where to find credible
information. You can email me at zoocrew@...

Thanks a ton - Tina
